Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles a single ship.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group 1 - DAT055 2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ship(int length, java.lang.String name)
      Construct a ship.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLength()
      Get the length of this ship.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name of this ship.
      void hit()
      Hit this ship with a bomb and decrease it's health, set it to sunk when the health reaches zero.
      boolean isPlaced()
      Check if the ship has been placed.
      boolean isSunk()
      Check if the ship is sunk.

      Set this ship as placed.

        public boolean isPlaced()
        Check if the ship has been placed.
        Returns:

      • isSunk

        public boolean isSunk()
        Check if the ship is sunk.
        Returns:
        true if the ship is sunk, false if it still floats

      • hit

        public void hit()
